project.name: TWIYS Media
project.shortDescription: We are gamifying the vetting process related to landing a lucrative brand or label deal for artists.
project.needSummary: We need help with admin of creative team as well as legal to advise on policies having to do with the manner of which the shows content is framed.
project.elevatorPitch: We are gamifying the vetting process related to landing a lucrative brand or label deal for artists.
project.additionalWidget1: I am actively building the framework for this new series and have also identified and formed relationships with some potential investors.
project.problem: The Hip Hop R&B music space is filled with mediocrity. By gamifying and raising a higher standard to achieve stardom, we are also inspiring a  new narrative for the industry as a whole.
project.mission: To effectively provide underground artists a fast track alternative to the music industry maze while inspiring a higher standard of conduct within it.
project.vision: To change the narrative surrounding the urban music culture globally.

timeGoals.now: I have a brand partnership on the horizon with a prominent media house based out of Atlanta.
timeGoals.oneYear: Fully operational with at least two seasons of content in the hanger, while actively licensing our first season to media conglomerates like Netflix or Hulu.
timeGoals.threeYears: Recognized globally for effectively changing the narrative surrounding the music industry at large.

description.excerpt: Imagine a music entertainment series, developed solely to inspire artists toward a higher code of conduct within the music industry. The World Is Your Stage or TWIYS  Media, centers around 8 contestants and the challenges they face having to do with a different set of criteria other than simply their talent and charisma.

fundraises.time: LMT Studios - investment mid 2021-waiting for MVP
LND1440 Media House -Brand partnership on the horizon

availableRoles.title: Full stack developer
availableRoles.description: Design for the front end and back end, of the connected app for the contestant user experience, as well as the audience user experience.

availableRoles.title: Marketing lead
availableRoles.description: Design rollout/launch in concert with existing marketing/promo strategies. Promotion materials for socials and business sites at launch.

availableRoles.title: Public Relations
availableRoles.description: facilitate associated press releases, radio, and/or television appearances of the cast and crew of the series.

compensationOfferings.title: Most Popular
compensationOfferings.description: Contributors get 1% of their normal rate in cash, and the remaining 99% in Contributor Credits* at 3 credits per dollar.

compensationOfferings.title: Custom
compensationOfferings.description: Compensation amounts and options will be based on the qualifications of individual and the service he or she is providing

project.helpDescription: Where to start? 1st may need help with all the admin of an entire creative team complete with PA's and a legal arm to properly advise on policies having to do with the dynamic of filming and the manner of which the shows content is framed.

users.title: Founder
users.bio: I am an entrepreneur with over 15 years experience behind the scenes of the music industry. My contacts range from A list celebrities to models and photographers and influencers and span continents. My personal experiences have afforded me a deep humility and reverence for our icons and it is my goal to highlight their legacies while building mine.
users.projectLove: I want to inspire entrepreneurs toward social change.

users.title: Team member/artist
users.bio: Iâ€™m a 27 year old male located in Los Angeles. Iâ€™m currently a full time behavioral therapist and recording artist. I have experience working in graphic design, streetwear, and large scale music festival planning.

users.title: Networking and Administration
users.projectLove: Helping and joining hands with a friend to do better, connect with others and to grow for a better life.

users.title: Brand Ambassador
users.projectLove: I want to make the world a better place in any capacity that Iâ€™m able to.

users.title: Actress, Model, Stylist
users.bio: Influential, Creator I have been in the Entertainment Industry for over twenty years with a combination of Marketing, Music, Business Production experience and mentor.
users.projectLove: I was asked to join this team I was immediately inspired,  and I know I will be an asset to the team.
users.projectRole: Part of the creative team working as a Actress, Model, Stylist

users.title: Creative & Digital Marketing Strategist
users.bio: I am a street smart digital native well versed with the digital world and digital lifestyles. I am curious about how things digital are increasingly becoming integrated with all facets of life as a result I have been involved in building & launching multiple start-ups, local brands & products online and offline where my main role has been Creative & Digital Strategy. I am an active user of many digital platforms from slack to sprout, and I know a thing or two about coding(HTML & CSS).
users.projectLove: I am passionate about small businesses and the arts and I want to dedicate my time and effort in helping artists build sustainable businesses.
users.projectRole: As a Creative & Digital Marketing Strategist my role is first and foremost a creative leader and thinker. I will help in crafting proposals for brands across advertising, film, television and streaming etc. I will work with the broader team to make sure the marketing strategy aligns with the business objectives, I will conceptualize social media campaigns and experiential marketing activities to ensure that the project is successful.

users.title: Influencer & Team Member
users.bio: I am a Massachusetts-based model and influencer.
users.projectLove: I heard about it from Clubhouse!

users.title: Influencer & Team Member
users.bio: I graduated with a BA Corporate Communication degree from Rand Afrikaans University in 2003. For 7 years, I worked as a Production/Account Manager doing brand activations such as product launches, events, road shows, mall activations and in-store promotions for numerous major companies. My most recent profession and something that I am very good at and I enjoy immensely, is copywriting. I have done freelance work as a ghostwriter, copywriter, editor and online write-ups.
users.projectLove: Luke asked me because he knew I would be a good fit but it would be ridiculous to say that was my only motivating factor. I am also extremely motivated be involved in a project that has the most potential. To be part of creating something of such magnitude would motivate just about anybody.
users.projectRole: My role is whatever it needs to be! I excel at project management, organization, promotions, event management and planning, basically - brand activations. I can also be a top micro-manager and what I mean by micro-management is that I'm good at telling people what to do, when to do it and how to do it whilst I watch them do it. So if you need someone to micro-manage, I've been one for as long as I can remember because I have bossy-boot qualities. I am an excellent writer and writing is something I really enjoy. I love talking to and meeting interesting people I can be extremely persuasive and convincing. So my role could be marketing, sales, copywriting, networking and/or micro-management.

users.title: Contributor
users.bio: A mind blowing upcoming artist that keeps the audience staring in Awe.
users.projectLove: It supports me, helps me grow, and will help me be more equipped with information.
users.projectRole: Contributor and a supporter to gain and absorb more as an artist/team member.

users.title: Influencer & Media Entertainment Manager
users.bio: I am a Blogger, Web & Graphic Designer, Editor, Copywriter, International Photographer, Social Media Specialist and Influencer
users.projectLove: When a good friend approached me and asked if I'd be interested in joining this project I immediately said yes. Any project my friend is a part of can only be one that is going to help others and if there is anything I can assist with in helping others too. You can count me in
users.projectRole: My role is to be the person on the ground promoting the project through various methods to ensure maximum exposure is reached from maximum audience
